sourcesContent:
{showReceipt && (

Belle Fiori

112 Elliot, Riverside, Jakarta

Telp: 0819-9779-9924

{new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

Customer Name:

{customerName}

Table Number:

{tableNumber}

Status:

{status}

Daftar Pesanan:

Menu Quantity Price (Rp)
{orders.map((order, index) => (
{order.menu} {order.quantity} {/* Center quantity */} {order.harga.toLocaleString()}
))}

Total: Rp{total.toLocaleString() || 0}

)}
